actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To exempt child care services from the limitation imposed by section 1130 of the Social Security Act upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under the various Federal State assistance programs.

summary.text: Exempts child care services from the limitation imposed by the State and Local Assistance Act of 1972 upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under the various Federal-State public assistance programs.

titles.title: To exempt child care services from the limitation imposed by section 1130 of the Social Security Act upon the amount payable to States as grants for social services under the various Federal State assistance programs.
